verses.t: And{G1161} he said{G3004} also{G2532} unto{G4314} his{G846} disciples{G3588}, There was{G2258} a certain{G5100} rich{G4145} man{G444}, which{G3739} had{G2192} a steward{G3623}; and{G2532} the same{G3778} was accused{G1225} unto him{G846} that{G5613} he had wasted{G1287} his{G846} goods{G5224}.

And{G2532} he called{G5455} him{G846}, and said{G2036} unto him{G846}, How is it{G5101} that I hear{G191} this{G5124} of{G4012} thee{G4675}? give{G591} an account{G3588} of thy{G4675} stewardship{G3588}; for{G1063} thou mayest be{G1410} no{G3756} longer{G2089} steward{G3621}.

Then{G1161} the steward{G3588} said{G2036} within{G1722} himself{G1438}, What{G5101} shall I do{G4160}? for{G3754} my{G3450} lord{G3588} taketh away{G851} from{G575} me{G1700} the stewardship{G3588}: I cannot{G2480} dig{G4626}; to beg{G1871} I am ashamed{G153}.
I am resolved{G1097} what{G5101} to do{G4160}, that{G2443}, when{G3752} I am put out{G3179} of the stewardship{G3588}, they may receive{G1209} me{G3165} into{G1519} their{G846} houses{G3588}.

So{G2532} he called{G4341} every{G1538} one{G1520} of his{G1438} lord's{G3588} debtors{G3588} unto him, and said{G3004} unto the first{G4413}, How much{G4214} owest thou{G3784} unto my{G3450} lord{G3588}?

And{G1161} he said{G2036}, An hundred{G1540} measures{G943} of oil{G1637}. And{G2532} he said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Take{G1209} thy{G4675} bill{G3588}, and{G2532} sit down{G2523} quickly{G5030}, and write{G1125} fifty{G4004}.

Then{G1899} said he{G2036} to another{G2087}, And{G1161} how much{G4214} owest{G3784} thou{G4771}? And{G1161} he said{G2036}, An hundred{G1540} measures{G2884} of wheat{G4621}. And{G2532} he said{G3004} unto him{G846}, Take{G1209} thy{G4675} bill{G3588}, and{G2532} write{G1125} fourscore{G3589}.

And{G2532} the lord{G3588} commended{G1867} the unjust{G3588} steward{G3588}, because{G3754} he had done{G4160} wisely{G5430}: for{G3754} the children{G3588} of this{G5127} world{G3588} are{G1526} in{G1519} their{G1438} generation{G3588} wiser{G5429} than{G5228} the children{G3588} of light{G3588}.

And I{G2504} say{G3004} unto you{G5213}, Make{G4160} to yourselves{G1438} friends{G5384} of{G1537} the mammon{G3588} of unrighteousness{G3588}; that{G2443}, when{G3752} ye fail{G1587}, they may receive{G1209} you{G5209} into{G1519} everlasting{G166} habitations{G4633}.NOTE! No definitions! Extra word: "mammon"

He that{G3588} is faithful{G4103} in{G1722} that which is least{G1646} is faithful{G4103} also{G2532} in{G1722} much{G4183}: and{G2532} he that{G3588} is{G2076} unjust{G94} in{G1722} the least{G1646} is{G2076} unjust{G94} also{G2532} in{G1722} much{G4183}.

If{G1487} therefore{G3767} ye have{G1096} not{G3756} been{G1096} faithful{G4103} in{G1722} the unrighteous{G94} mammon{G3126}, who{G5101} will commit{G4100} to your{G5213} trust{G4100} the true{G228} riches?Note! Extra word: "mammon"

And{G2532} if{G1487} ye have{G1096} not{G3756} been{G1096} faithful{G4103} in{G1722} that which{G3588} is another man's{G245}, who{G5101} shall give{G1325} you{G5213} that which{G3588} is your own{G5212}?

No{G3762} servant{G3610} can{G1410} serve{G1398} two{G1417} masters{G2962}: for{G1063} either{G2228} he will hate{G3404} the one{G1520}, and{G2532} love{G25} the other{G2087}; or else{G2228} he will hold to{G472} the one{G1520}, and{G2532} despise{G2706} the other{G2087}. Ye cannot{G1410} serve{G1398} God{G2316} and{G2532} mammon{G3126}.
And{G1161} the Pharisees{G3588} also{G2532}, who were{G5225} covetous{G5366}, heard{G191} all{G3956} these things{G5023}: and{G2532} they derided{G1592} him{G846}.

And{G2532} he said{G2036} unto them{G846}, Ye{G5210} are{G2075} they which{G3588} justify{G1344} yourselves{G1438} before{G1799} men{G3588}; but{G1161} God{G2316} knoweth{G1097} your{G5216} hearts{G3588}: for{G3754} that which{G3588} is highly esteemed{G5308} among{G1722} men{G444} is{G2076} abomination{G946} in the sight{G1799} of God{G3588}.

The law{G3588} and{G2532} the prophets{G3588} were until{G2193} John{G2491}: since{G575} that time{G5119} the kingdom{G3588} of God{G3588} is preached{G2097}, and{G2532} every man{G3956} presseth{G971} into{G1519} it{G846}.
And{G1161} it is{G2076} easier{G2123} for heaven{G3588} and{G2532} earth{G3588} to pass{G3928}, than{G2228} one{G1520} tittle{G2762} of the law{G3588} to fail{G4098}.

Whosoever{G3956} putteth away{G630} his{G846} wife{G3588}, and{G2532} marrieth{G1060} another{G2087}, committeth adultery{G3431}: and{G2532} whosoever{G3956} marrieth her{G1060} that{G3588} is put away{G630} from{G575} her husband{G435} committeth adultery{G3431}.
There was{G2258} a certain{G5100} rich{G4145} man{G444}, which{G2532} was clothed{G1737} in purple{G4209} and{G2532} fine linen{G1040}, and fared{G2165} sumptuously{G2988} every{G2596} day{G2250}:
And{G1161} there was{G2258} a certain{G5100} beggar{G4434} named{G3686} Lazarus{G2976}, which{G3739} was laid{G906} at{G4314} his{G846} gate{G3588}, full of sores{G1669},

And{G2532} desiring{G1937} to be fed{G5526} with{G575} the crumbs{G3588} which{G3588} fell{G4098} from{G575} the rich man's{G4145} table{G3588}: moreover{G235} the dogs{G3588} came{G2064} and licked{G621} his{G846} sores{G3588}.

And{G1161} it came to pass{G1096}, that the beggar{G4434} died{G599}, and{G2532} was carried{G667} by{G5259} the angels{G3588} into{G1519} Abraham's{G11} bosom{G3588}: the rich man{G4145} also{G2532} died{G599}, and{G2532} was buried{G2290};

And{G2532} in{G1722} hell{G3588} he lift up{G1869} his{G846} eyes{G3588}, being{G5225} in{G1722} torments{G931}, and seeth{G3708} Abraham{G11} afar off{G3113}, and{G2532} Lazarus{G2976} in{G1722} his{G846} bosom{G3588}.

And{G2532} he{G846} cried{G5455} and said{G2036}, Father{G3962} Abraham{G11}, have mercy{G1653} on me{G3165}, and{G2532} send{G3992} Lazarus{G2976}, that{G2443} he may dip{G911} the tip{G3588} of his{G846} finger{G3588} in water{G5204}, and{G2532} cool{G2711} my{G3450} tongue{G3588}; for{G3754} I am tormented{G3600} in{G1722} this{G3778} flame{G3588}.

But{G1161} Abraham{G11} said{G2036}, Son{G5043}, remember{G3415} that{G3754} thou{G4771} in{G1722} thy{G4675} lifetime{G3588} receivedst{G618} thy{G4675} good things{G18}, and{G2532} likewise{G3668} Lazarus{G2976} evil things{G2556}: but{G1161} now{G3568} he{G3592} is comforted{G3870}, and{G1161} thou{G4771} art tormented{G3600}.

And{G2532}beside{G1909} all{G3956} this{G5125}, between{G3342} us{G2257} and{G2532} you{G5216} there is a great{G3173} gulf{G5490} fixed{G4741}: so that{G3704} they which{G3588} would{G2309} pass{G1224} from hence{G1782} to{G4314} you{G5209} cannot{G1410}; neither{G3366} can they pass{G1276} to{G4314} us{G2248}, that{G3588} would come from thence{G1564}.
Then{G1161} he said{G2036}, I pray{G2065} thee{G4571} therefore{G3767}, father{G3962}, that{G2443} thou wouldest send{G3992} him{G846} to{G1519} my{G3450} father's{G3588} house{G3588}:

For{G1063} I have{G2192} five{G4002} brethren{G80}; that{G3704} he may testify{G1263} unto them{G846}, lest{G2443} they{G846} also{G2532} come{G2064} into{G1519} this{G5126} place{G3588} of torment{G3588}.
Abraham{G11} saith{G3004} unto him{G846}, They have{G2192} Moses{G3475} and{G2532} the prophets{G3588}; let them hear{G191} them{G846}.
And{G1161} he said{G2036}, Nay{G3780}, father{G3962} Abraham{G11}: but{G235} if{G1437} one{G5100} went{G4198} unto{G4314} them{G846} from{G575} the dead{G3498}, they will repent{G3340}.

And{G1161} he said{G2036} unto him{G846}, If{G1487} they hear{G191} not{G3756} Moses{G3475} and{G2532} the prophets{G3588}, neither{G3761} will they be persuaded{G3982}, though{G1437} one{G5100} rose{G450} from{G1537} the dead{G3498}.
